mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart (name, image, user_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, number, amount, create_time) values (#{name}, #{image}, #{userId}, #{dishId}, #{setmealId}, #{dishFlavor}, #{number}, #{amount}, #{createTime})
